title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of Rural and Community Development) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department rural community development) order 2024

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Anne-Marie McNally, particulars of whose address have been deposited
text_raw:
2. Anne-Marie McNally, particulars of whose address have been deposited 
at the offices of the Department of Rural and Community Development, is 
appointed as Special Adviser to Joe O'Brien, Minister of State at the Department 
of Rural and Community Development with effect from 10 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

21 May, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [239] 3
